DO NOT BUY.
This game is so fucking broken in favor of the killers you would think they'd change the name of it to American Horror Stories. You have no chance  of survival righ now unless you go up against a cool guy who lets you live or a person whose never played before. Which sucks because it used to be and is normally pretty fun, but because of how the devs fucked this game I cannot nor will I recommend it. I also firmly believe that the devs no longer listen to critiques and now rely on pay to win "dlc's" that again favor the killer.

傻逼zzz，越改越傻逼，现在人类当板皇，速修，屠夫带顶配打针对，屠夫反正是绝对没有体验的，人类仅剩的体验可能就是一通放板爆修然后开机在门口1212。
老子一个双边玩家玩人类就得被机子吸住，啥也不能干。
因为你不知道屠夫是不是顶配+苹果来撒气的，也不知道队友板子放了多少，稍微逛下街修慢了就GG
玩屠夫就你妈离谱，但凡不打针对至少3跑起步
我你妈杀人效率都很高了，机子还是跟鬼畜一样蹭蹭蹭的亮
国服又卡，各种掉线就不说了，简直人均暴躁老哥，一言不合就拔线
外服人均偷电狂魔，见你过去就弹射往板子那儿跑，你追几步就亮亮三台，你不追他就回去继续偷，一点儿博弈都没有了
我真是玩你的妈，傻逼zzz，滚去吃屎吧

Я ненавижу эту игру. У меня кривые руки для игры на клавиатуре и замедленная реакция. Поэтому я постоянно страдаю. Но я не могу перестать в неё играть. Как сурва, которого сущность затащила в свой мир и заставляет раз за разом переживать кошмар, так и меня эта тупая игра приковала к экрану. .... Пойду повишу на крюке или поймаю мордой пару досок.
이게 뭔 생존게임이냐

After playing for two hours, although not much, I see myself playing this even more in the future. In fact, I loved it so much, I purchased the Halloween DLC. If you're a fan of Friday the 13th: The Game, this game is right up your alley.

PROS:
Movie Killers (Leatherface, Freddy, Michael, The Pig, etc)
Suspenseful gameplay
Good premise
Great gameplay overall

CONS:
Bugs
Matchmaking can be bad at times
The killers you get for free are not very interesting
Depending on your view, survivors can get too many chances to survive.

Overall, I think you should purchase this game if you're a fan of slasher movies, or as an alternate to Friday the 13th: The Game, and their lawsuit issue.

Прикольная игра , особенно когда играешь за <Жертву> с друзьями можно постебаться над маньяком. 
Правда если играть одному , то она быстро надоедает. 
9 из 10 , всё-таки что-то в ней не хватает.

Very fun game at its core.  Great concept with interesting characters to play.

The balance is really out of whack.  Survivors are exceedingly in control of the game to the point that only 3 killers are considered viable at Mediumhigh-High rank and only 1 of them are consistant.

Even at lower ranks as most killers you start the match in the hole and have to fight your way out of it. The Devs do not seem to be on top of this issue sadly.


Despite its flaws it is addictive, Fun and full of character and I recommend it because it will most likely just keep improving.

This is a hard one to swallow but i'm still recommending it. I love the game and the gameplay is good especially with a group of friends or if your alone its still as enjoyable (so long as your the killer and not some pub group).

It's just the developers haven't been making the best decisions for the game. I can understand the paid dlc for the new killer and the charcters so that they can make more content and new maps but the cash shop they've put in is a step too far in my opinion it feels like Smite's unlocking system (which would be fine) if they didn't already have paid dlc for the game. 

Still though other than that this game is still worth picking up in my opinion even with its poor development team it has given me and my friends a good laugh a few scares and thats what games are for really at the end of the day enjoying yourself so I'd still recommend it.

EDIT: I wanted to update my review. I felt it's been while and alot of stuff has changed. 
However, my review for this, I will ALWAYS rocommend this game. 
I still love it. 

Today is 10/18/2018. 
I have close to 700 hours, Still Counting. 

If you're trying to decide if you want to spend that $20 to buy this game: Please Read this comment. I will mention a few PROs and CONs to this game for you.

One of the things, that has technically changed from my original review, is that this game: The Longer you play, you will lose that fear/suspense towards the game. Sometimes, things may startle you, but not for me however. 
Not much in this game scares me anymore but that doesn't make me turn away from this game at all. 

It's more of the aniexty that you will encounter as you deal with one of the silent killers, that will make you look around each corner to make sure they are not coming to get you. 
Or if you run into a good killer, it will challenge you in finishing that last gen or trying to find that hatch at end game.

However, this game will always give you a challenge. Each Game will NOT be the same. 

Similar; Yes. The Same; No, 

You're playing against Real People. Not A.I: 

The DEVs are always trying to fix glitches, Bugs, and are constantly adding new content and DLC to this game to keep it interesting. 

All Bugs and Glitches will not be fixed, and the game will never make you entirely happy with the updates, etc. But it's not being Babied JUST for you. 
You have to give and Take when it comes to games like this. 

One of the FEW Things I hate regarding this game are these: 

The Salty Players are still there. 
The ones who don't have the game going in their favor, such as player who disconnect when hooked or downed, or the killers who talk trash at the end, or the ones who face camp, and don't patrol to find other players, are part of the bad aspects of this game. 

I have also found that some, mostly ONE of the DEVS have an extremely poor/sarcastic behavior when addressing issues to the game in their YT/Twitch DBD Videos. 

When speaking to the players, on the Updates and Patches to the game, They react towards the players like we are Stupid. 

If this game was FREE, I would allow this behavior to slide. 
But this was a 20$ game. As well as the amount of money I have spent to Buy DLC and Cosmetics, ADDs up. 

This game was not free. Their Attitudes when speaking to players, needs to lighten the hell up. 

Otherwise, I Ignore their Comments. 
I ignore or Laugh at the Salty Players I encounter in the game. 

I have EVEN made a few GOOD friends in this game that I play with on a DAILY basis. 

I love this game. 
I love the Good People. 
I Will ALWAYS Recommend this Game. 


ORIGINAL REVIEW:

"I LOVE this game. 
I hate the salty people. 
But it's a good game. Love the spooks, the Excitement, and the Suspense. 
If you're up for a fun match, then play it. It's not literally a life and death situation. Don't take everything so seriously."

操作になれて、本当に面白いと思うには時間がかかりますが、ゲーム性は高いです。
煽りについてはキラーとサバイバーどちらともプレイすると分かるのですが、
下手なキラーだと、簡単に発電機がつき脱出するとランクが下がってしまうからです。
バージョンが変わってから特にその傾向が強いです。
そのため、無理やり鬼ごっこをせざる得ない状況になります。
煽られていると思わず、練習だと思えば良いと思います。
